title: Djed-pillar Amulet
description:
Amulet in the shape of a Djed-pillar. The piece is made of lapis lazuli. The pillar is surmounted by a round shape which must represent a sun-disk. The ties have their flat sides towards the bottom. The pillar does not have a back-pillar, but there is an eyelet protruding from the rear.
Condition:  Some incrustation.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
